Uses of Package
peregrine.controller

Packages that use peregrine.controller
peregrine.controller Main interface for the controller which allows one to kick off and execute jobs in the cluster. 
peregrine.controller.rpcd RPC entry point for the controller. 
peregrine.controller.rpcd.delegate RPC delegates for the controller. 
peregrine.controller.web Web interface for the controller. 
peregrine.task Task framework for map/reduce/merge. 
 

Classes in peregrine.controller used by peregrine.controller
ClusterState
          Keeps track of the state of the whole cluster.
Controller
          Main interface for running a map reduce job in Peregrine.
ControllerDaemon
          Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
Gossip
          Keeps track of system failures in the controller.
Offline
          Keeps track off hosts that were explicitly marked offline.
Online
          Keeps track of hosts once they come online.
 

Classes in peregrine.controller used by peregrine.controller.rpcd
ControllerDaemon
          Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
 

Classes in peregrine.controller used by peregrine.controller.rpcd.delegate
Controller
          Main interface for running a map reduce job in Peregrine.
ControllerDaemon
          Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
 

Classes in peregrine.controller used by peregrine.controller.web
ControllerDaemon
          Basic daemon for running the controller only (no FS operations).
 

Classes in peregrine.controller used by peregrine.task
ClusterState
          Keeps track of the state of the whole cluster.
